H0.text: The esophagus is an organ in which acid is produced.

H1.text: The large intestine is an organ in which an acid is produced.

H2.text: The small intestine is the organ in which an acid is produced.

H3.text: Stomach is the organ in which an acid is produced.

A4.text: The stomach releases proteases (protein-digesting enzymes such as pepsin), and hydrochloric acid, which kills or inhibits bacteria and provides the acidic pH of 2 for the proteases to work.
